events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest and submission of your resume.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills in software development and coding experience.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be your primary point of contact throughout the hiring process.
The initial screening interview was completed successfully where we discussed your previous projects in software engineering.
We received your prompt response to our initial screening feedback, indicating your continued enthusiasm and availability for the next steps.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior developer team for June 5th, focusing on coding challenges and system design.
